blocks.name: igenval
blocks.content: The ideal generated by a subset of a ring. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 10-Jun-2010.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 20-Dec-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm igenval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, crngo), wss(c1, c2)), wceq(co(c0, cigen, c1), cint(crab(s0, cfv(cidl, c0), wss(c1, cv(s0))))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c1st, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, crn(c3))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  mpd3an3(wcel(c0, crngo), wss(c1, c2), wceq(co(c0, cigen, c1), cint(crab(s0, cfv(cidl, c0), wss(c1, cv(s0))))), wcel(cint(crab(s0, cfv(cidl, c0), wss(c1, cv(s0)))), universe))
  sylib(wa(wcel(c0, crngo), wss(c1, c2)), wcel(cint(crab(s0, cfv(cidl, c0), wss(c1, cv(s0)))), universe), wne(crab(s0, cfv(cidl, c0), wss(c1, cv(s0))), emptycls))
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, crngo), wss(c1, c2)), wne(crab(s0, cfv(cidl, c0), wss(c1, cv(s0))), emptycls), wrex(s0, cfv(cidl, c0), wss(c1, cv(s0))))
  sylan(wcel(c0, crngo), wss(c1, c2), wrex(s0, cfv(cidl, c0), wss(c1, cv(s0))), wcel(c2, cfv(cidl, c0)))
  rngoidl(c0, c2, c3)
  rspcev(s0, c2, cfv(cidl, c0), wss(c1, c2), wss(c1, cv(s0)))
  sseq2(cv(s0), c2, c1)
  rabn0(s0, cfv(cidl, c0), wss(c1, cv(s0)))
  intex(crab(s0, cfv(cidl, c0), wss(c1, cv(s0))))
  syl3an2br(wcel(c0, crngo), wss(c1, c2), wcel(cint(crab(s0, cfv(cidl, c0), wss(c1, cv(s0)))), universe), wceq(co(c0, cigen, c1), cint(crab(s0, cfv(cidl, c0), wss(c1, cv(s0))))), wcel(c1, cpw(c2)))
  elpw2(c1, c2)
  eqeltri(c2, universe, crn(c3))
  rnex(c3)
  fvexi(c3, c1st, c0)
  ovmpt2x(hs0, hs1, c0, crngo, c1, cpw(c2), cint(crab(s0, cfv(cidl, c0), wss(c1, cv(s0)))), universe, cigen, cint(crab(s0, cfv(cidl, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs1), cv(s0)))), cpw(crn(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)))))
  inteqd(crab(s0, cfv(cidl, cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs1), cv(s0))), crab(s0, cfv(cidl, c0), wss(c1, cv(s0))), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)))
  rabeqbidv(s0, cfv(cidl, cv(hs0)), cfv(cidl, c0), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)), wss(cv(hs1), cv(s0)), wss(c1, cv(s0)))
  fveq2d(cidl, cv(hs0), c0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1)))
  simpl(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  adantl(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wb(wss(cv(hs1), cv(s0)), wss(c1, cv(s0))))
  sseq1(cv(hs1), c1, cv(s0))
  pweqd(crn(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0))), c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(crn(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0))), c2, crn(c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  rneqd(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c3, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl6eqr(cfv(c1st, cv(hs0)), c3, cfv(c1st, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, c1st)
  df-igen(hs0, hs1, s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cidl, c0)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(crngo)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cpw(c2))
  diff.hs0.c(cint(crab(s0, cfv(cidl, c0), wss(c1, cv(s0)))))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(crngo)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cpw(c2))
  diff.hs1.c(cint(crab(s0, cfv(cidl, c0), wss(c1, cv(s0)))))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cidl, cv(hs0))
  diff.cidl.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c1))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs1), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm igenval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ RingOps ∧ c1 ⊆ c2)→(c0[IdlGen]c1)= ⋂ { s0 ∈(Idl ` c0)| c1 ⊆ s0 })
  ⊣ c3 =(1st ` c0)
  ⊣ c2 = ran(c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  mpd3an3(c0 ∈ RingOps, c1 ⊆ c2, (c0[IdlGen]c1)= ⋂ { s0 ∈(Idl ` c0)| c1 ⊆ s0 }, ⋂ { s0 ∈(Idl ` c0)| c1 ⊆ s0 } ∈ 𝕌)
  sylib((c0 ∈ RingOps ∧ c1 ⊆ c2), ⋂ { s0 ∈(Idl ` c0)| c1 ⊆ s0 } ∈ 𝕌, { s0 ∈(Idl ` c0)| c1 ⊆ s0 } ≠ ∅)
  sylibr((c0 ∈ RingOps ∧ c1 ⊆ c2), { s0 ∈(Idl ` c0)| c1 ⊆ s0 } ≠ ∅, ∃(s0 ∈(Idl ` c0), c1 ⊆ s0))
  sylan(c0 ∈ RingOps, c1 ⊆ c2, ∃(s0 ∈(Idl ` c0), c1 ⊆ s0), c2 ∈(Idl ` c0))
  rngoidl(c0, c2, c3)
  rspcev(s0, c2, (Idl ` c0), c1 ⊆ c2, c1 ⊆ s0)
  sseq2(s0, c2, c1)
  rabn0(s0, (Idl ` c0), c1 ⊆ s0)
  intex({ s0 ∈(Idl ` c0)| c1 ⊆ s0 })
  syl3an2br(c0 ∈ RingOps, c1 ⊆ c2, ⋂ { s0 ∈(Idl ` c0)| c1 ⊆ s0 } ∈ 𝕌, (c0[IdlGen]c1)= ⋂ { s0 ∈(Idl ` c0)| c1 ⊆ s0 }, c1 ∈ P(c2))
  elpw2(c1, c2)
  eqeltri(c2, universe, ran(c3))
  rnex(c3)
  fvexi(c3, c1st, c0)
  ovmpt2x(hs0, hs1, c0, crngo, c1, P(c2), ⋂ { s0 ∈(Idl ` c0)| c1 ⊆ s0 }, universe, cigen, ⋂ { s0 ∈(Idl ` hs0)| hs1 ⊆ s0 }, P(ran((1st ` hs0))))
  inteqd({ s0 ∈(Idl ` hs0)| hs1 ⊆ s0 }, { s0 ∈(Idl ` c0)| c1 ⊆ s0 }, (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c1))
  rabeqbidv(s0, (Idl ` hs0), (Idl ` c0), (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c1), hs1 ⊆ s0, c1 ⊆ s0)
  fveq2d(cidl, hs0, c0, (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c1))
  simpl(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c1)
  adantl(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c1, (hs1 ⊆ s0 ↔ c1 ⊆ s0))
  sseq1(hs1, c1, s0)
  pweqd(ran((1st ` hs0)), c2, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr(ran((1st ` hs0)), c2, ran(c3), hs0 = c0)
  rneqd((1st ` hs0), c3, hs0 = c0)
  syl6eqr((1st ` hs0), c3, (1st ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, c1st)
  df-igen(hs0, hs1, s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cidl, c0)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(crngo)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(P(c2))
  diff.hs0.c(⋂ { s0 ∈(Idl ` c0)| c1 ⊆ s0 })
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(crngo)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(P(c2))
  diff.hs1.c(⋂ { s0 ∈(Idl ` c0)| c1 ⊆ s0 })
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cidl, hs0)
  diff.cidl.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, hs0 = c0, hs1 = c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs1, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: igenss
blocks.content: A set is a subset of the ideal it generates. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 10-Jun-2010.)

blocks.name: igenidl
blocks.content: The ideal generated by a set is an ideal. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 10-Jun-2010.)
blocks.origin:
thm igenidl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, crngo), wss(c1, c2)), wcel(co(c0, cigen, c1), cfv(cidl, c0)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c1st, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, crn(c3))
} = {
  eqeltrd(co(c0, cigen, c1), cfv(cidl, c0), cint(crab(hs0, cfv(cidl, c0), wss(c1, cv(hs0)))), wa(wcel(c0, crngo), wss(c1, c2)))
  igenval(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  syldan(wcel(c0, crngo), wss(c1, c2), wcel(cint(crab(hs0, cfv(cidl, c0), wss(c1, cv(hs0)))), cfv(cidl, c0)), wne(crab(hs0, cfv(cidl, c0), wss(c1, cv(hs0))), emptycls))
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, crngo), wss(c1, c2)), wne(crab(hs0, cfv(cidl, c0), wss(c1, cv(hs0))), emptycls), wrex(hs0, cfv(cidl, c0), wss(c1, cv(hs0))))
  sylan(wcel(c0, crngo), wss(c1, c2), wrex(hs0, cfv(cidl, c0), wss(c1, cv(hs0))), wcel(c2, cfv(cidl, c0)))
  rngoidl(c0, c2, c3)
  rspcev(hs0, c2, cfv(cidl, c0), wss(c1, c2), wss(c1, cv(hs0)))
  sseq2(cv(hs0), c2, c1)
  rabn0(hs0, cfv(cidl, c0), wss(c1, cv(hs0)))
  mp3an3(wcel(c0, crngo), wne(crab(hs0, cfv(cidl, c0), wss(c1, cv(hs0))), emptycls), wcel(cint(crab(hs0, cfv(cidl, c0), wss(c1, cv(hs0)))), cfv(cidl, c0)), wss(crab(hs0, cfv(cidl, c0), wss(c1, cv(hs0))), cfv(cidl, c0)))
  ssrab2(hs0, cfv(cidl, c0), wss(c1, cv(hs0)))
  intidl(c0, crab(hs0, cfv(cidl, c0), wss(c1, cv(hs0))))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cidl, c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wss(c1, c2))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm igenidl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ RingOps ∧ c1 ⊆ c2)→(c0[IdlGen]c1)∈(Idl ` c0))
  ⊣ c3 =(1st ` c0)
  ⊣ c2 = ran(c3)
} = {
  eqeltrd((c0[IdlGen]c1), (Idl ` c0), ⋂ { hs0 ∈(Idl ` c0)| c1 ⊆ hs0 }, (c0 ∈ RingOps ∧ c1 ⊆ c2))
  igenval(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  syldan(c0 ∈ RingOps, c1 ⊆ c2, ⋂ { hs0 ∈(Idl ` c0)| c1 ⊆ hs0 } ∈(Idl ` c0), { hs0 ∈(Idl ` c0)| c1 ⊆ hs0 } ≠ ∅)
  sylibr((c0 ∈ RingOps ∧ c1 ⊆ c2), { hs0 ∈(Idl ` c0)| c1 ⊆ hs0 } ≠ ∅, ∃(hs0 ∈(Idl ` c0), c1 ⊆ hs0))
  sylan(c0 ∈ RingOps, c1 ⊆ c2, ∃(hs0 ∈(Idl ` c0), c1 ⊆ hs0), c2 ∈(Idl ` c0))
  rngoidl(c0, c2, c3)
  rspcev(hs0, c2, (Idl ` c0), c1 ⊆ c2, c1 ⊆ hs0)
  sseq2(hs0, c2, c1)
  rabn0(hs0, (Idl ` c0), c1 ⊆ hs0)
  mp3an3(c0 ∈ RingOps, { hs0 ∈(Idl ` c0)| c1 ⊆ hs0 } ≠ ∅, ⋂ { hs0 ∈(Idl ` c0)| c1 ⊆ hs0 } ∈(Idl ` c0), { hs0 ∈(Idl ` c0)| c1 ⊆ hs0 } ⊆(Idl ` c0))
  ssrab2(hs0, (Idl ` c0), c1 ⊆ hs0)
  intidl(c0, { hs0 ∈(Idl ` c0)| c1 ⊆ hs0 })
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c((Idl ` c0))
  diff.hs0.w(c1 ⊆ c2)
}

blocks.name: igenmin
blocks.content: The ideal generated by a set is the minimal ideal containing that set. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 10-Jun-2010.)
blocks.origin:
thm igenmin(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, cfv(cidl, c0)), wss(c2, c1)), wss(co(c0, cigen, c2), c1))
} = {
  eqsstrd(co(c0, cigen, c2), c1, cint(crab(hs0, cfv(cidl, c0), wss(c2, cv(hs0)))), w3a(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, cfv(cidl, c0)), wss(c2, c1)))
  3impa(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, cfv(cidl, c0)), wss(c2, c1), wceq(co(c0, cigen, c2), cint(crab(hs0, cfv(cidl, c0), wss(c2, cv(hs0))))))
  syldanl(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, cfv(cidl, c0)), wss(c2, c1), wceq(co(c0, cigen, c2), cint(crab(hs0, cfv(cidl, c0), wss(c2, cv(hs0))))), wss(c1, crn(cfv(c1st, c0))))
  idlss(c0, c1, crn(cfv(c1st, c0)), cfv(c1st, c0))
  anassrs(wcel(c0, crngo), wss(c1, crn(cfv(c1st, c0))), wss(c2, c1), wceq(co(c0, cigen, c2), cint(crab(hs0, cfv(cidl, c0), wss(c2, cv(hs0))))))
  sylan2(wcel(c0, crngo), wa(wss(c1, crn(cfv(c1st, c0))), wss(c2, c1)), wceq(co(c0, cigen, c2), cint(crab(hs0, cfv(cidl, c0), wss(c2, cv(hs0))))), wss(c2, crn(cfv(c1st, c0))))
  ancoms(wss(c1, crn(cfv(c1st, c0))), wss(c2, c1), wss(c2, crn(cfv(c1st, c0))))
  sstr(c2, c1, crn(cfv(c1st, c0)))
  igenval(hs0, c0, c2, crn(cfv(c1st, c0)), cfv(c1st, c0))
  eqid(cfv(c1st, c0))
  eqid(crn(cfv(c1st, c0)))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, cfv(cidl, c0)), wss(c2, c1), wss(cint(crab(hs0, cfv(cidl, c0), wss(c2, cv(hs0)))), c1))
  intminss(hs0, c1, cfv(cidl, c0), wss(c2, c1), wss(c2, cv(hs0)))
  sseq2(cv(hs0), c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(crn(cfv(c1st, c0)))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cidl, c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wss(c2, c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm igenmin(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ RingOps ∧ c1 ∈(Idl ` c0)∧ c2 ⊆ c1)→(c0[IdlGen]c2)⊆ c1)
} = {
  eqsstrd((c0[IdlGen]c2), c1, ⋂ { hs0 ∈(Idl ` c0)| c2 ⊆ hs0 }, (c0 ∈ RingOps ∧ c1 ∈(Idl ` c0)∧ c2 ⊆ c1))
  3impa(c0 ∈ RingOps, c1 ∈(Idl ` c0), c2 ⊆ c1, (c0[IdlGen]c2)= ⋂ { hs0 ∈(Idl ` c0)| c2 ⊆ hs0 })
  syldanl(c0 ∈ RingOps, c1 ∈(Idl ` c0), c2 ⊆ c1, (c0[IdlGen]c2)= ⋂ { hs0 ∈(Idl ` c0)| c2 ⊆ hs0 }, c1 ⊆ ran((1st ` c0)))
  idlss(c0, c1, ran((1st ` c0)), (1st ` c0))
  anassrs(c0 ∈ RingOps, c1 ⊆ ran((1st ` c0)), c2 ⊆ c1, (c0[IdlGen]c2)= ⋂ { hs0 ∈(Idl ` c0)| c2 ⊆ hs0 })
  sylan2(c0 ∈ RingOps, (c1 ⊆ ran((1st ` c0))∧ c2 ⊆ c1), (c0[IdlGen]c2)= ⋂ { hs0 ∈(Idl ` c0)| c2 ⊆ hs0 }, c2 ⊆ ran((1st ` c0)))
  ancoms(c1 ⊆ ran((1st ` c0)), c2 ⊆ c1, c2 ⊆ ran((1st ` c0)))
  sstr(c2, c1, ran((1st ` c0)))
  igenval(hs0, c0, c2, ran((1st ` c0)), (1st ` c0))
  eqid((1st ` c0))
  eqid(ran((1st ` c0)))
  3adant1(c0 ∈ RingOps, c1 ∈(Idl ` c0), c2 ⊆ c1, ⋂ { hs0 ∈(Idl ` c0)| c2 ⊆ hs0 } ⊆ c1)
  intminss(hs0, c1, (Idl ` c0), c2 ⊆ c1, c2 ⊆ hs0)
  sseq2(hs0, c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(ran((1st ` c0)))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c((Idl ` c0))
  diff.hs0.w(c2 ⊆ c1)
}

blocks.name: igenidl2
blocks.content: The ideal generated by an ideal is that ideal. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 10-Jun-2010.)
blocks.origin:
thm igenidl2(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, cfv(cidl, c0))), wceq(co(c0, cigen, c1), c1))
} = {
  eqtrd(co(c0, cigen, c1), c1, cint(crab(hs0, cfv(cidl, c0), wss(c1, cv(hs0)))), wa(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, cfv(cidl, c0))))
  syldan(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, cfv(cidl, c0)), wceq(co(c0, cigen, c1), cint(crab(hs0, cfv(cidl, c0), wss(c1, cv(hs0))))), wss(c1, crn(cfv(c1st, c0))))
  idlss(c0, c1, crn(cfv(c1st, c0)), cfv(c1st, c0))
  igenval(hs0, c0, c1, crn(cfv(c1st, c0)), cfv(c1st, c0))
  eqid(cfv(c1st, c0))
  eqid(crn(cfv(c1st, c0)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(c1, cfv(cidl, c0)), wceq(cint(crab(hs0, cfv(cidl, c0), wss(c1, cv(hs0)))), c1))
  intmin(hs0, c1, cfv(cidl, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(crn(cfv(c1st, c0)))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cidl, c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm igenidl2(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ RingOps ∧ c1 ∈(Idl ` c0))→(c0[IdlGen]c1)= c1)
} = {
  eqtrd((c0[IdlGen]c1), c1, ⋂ { hs0 ∈(Idl ` c0)| c1 ⊆ hs0 }, (c0 ∈ RingOps ∧ c1 ∈(Idl ` c0)))
  syldan(c0 ∈ RingOps, c1 ∈(Idl ` c0), (c0[IdlGen]c1)= ⋂ { hs0 ∈(Idl ` c0)| c1 ⊆ hs0 }, c1 ⊆ ran((1st ` c0)))
  idlss(c0, c1, ran((1st ` c0)), (1st ` c0))
  igenval(hs0, c0, c1, ran((1st ` c0)), (1st ` c0))

blocks.name: isfldidl
blocks.content: Determine if a ring is a field based on its ideals. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 10-Jun-2010.)
blocks.origin:
thm isfldidl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cfld), w3a(wcel(c0, ccring), wne(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(cidl, c0), cpr(csn(c2), c3))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(c1st, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(c2nd, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, crn(c4))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cgi, c4))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cgi, c5))
} = {
  impbii(wcel(c0, cfld), w3a(wcel(c0, ccring), wne(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(cidl, c0), cpr(csn(c2), c3))))
  3jca(wcel(c0, cfld), wcel(c0, ccring), wne(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(cidl, c0), cpr(csn(c2), c3)))
  fldcrng(c0)
  syl(wcel(c0, cfld), wne(c1, c2), wcel(c0, cdrng))
  dvrunz(c0, c1, c2, c4, c5, c3)
  syl(wcel(c0, cfld), wceq(cfv(cidl, c0), cpr(csn(c2), c3)), wcel(c0, cdrng))
  flddivrng(c0)
  divrngidl(c0, c2, c3, c4, c5)
  sylanbrc(w3a(wcel(c0, ccring), wne(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(cidl, c0), cpr(csn(c2), c3))), wcel(c0, cfld), wcel(c0, cdrng), wcel(c0, ccring))
  sylibr(w3a(wcel(c0, ccring), wne(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(cidl, c0), cpr(csn(c2), c3))), wcel(c0, cdrng), wa(wcel(c0, crngo), wa(wne(c1, c2), wral(hs1, cdif(c3, csn(c2)), wrex(hs0, c3, wceq(co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(hs1)), c1))))))
  jca32(w3a(wcel(c0, ccring), wne(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(cidl, c0), cpr(csn(c2), c3))), wcel(c0, crngo), wne(c1, c2), wral(hs1, cdif(c3, csn(c2)), wrex(hs0, c3, wceq(co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(hs1)), c1))))

  ralrimiva(hs1, cdif(c3, csn(c2)), wa(wcel(c0, ccring), wceq(cfv(cidl, c0), cpr(csn(c2), c3))), wrex(hs0, c3, wceq(co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(hs1)), c1)))
  sylibr(wa(wa(wcel(c0, ccring), wceq(cfv(cidl, c0), cpr(csn(c2), c3))), wcel(cv(hs1), cdif(c3, csn(c2)))), wrex(hs0, c3, wceq(co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(hs1)), c1)), wrex(hs0, c3, wceq(c1, co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(hs1)))))
  simprd(wa(wa(wcel(c0, ccring), wceq(cfv(cidl, c0), cpr(csn(c2), c3))), wcel(cv(hs1), cdif(c3, csn(c2)))), wrex(hs0, c3, wceq(c1, co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(hs1)))), wcel(c1, c3))
  sylib(wa(wa(wcel(c0, ccring), wceq(cfv(cidl, c0), cpr(csn(c2), c3))), wcel(cv(hs1), cdif(c3, csn(c2)))), wa(wcel(c1, c3), wrex(hs0, c3, wceq(c1, co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(hs1))))), wcel(c1, crab(hs2, c3, wrex(hs0, c3, wceq(cv(hs2), co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(hs1)))))))
  eleqtrd(c1, crab(hs2, c3, wrex(hs0, c3, wceq(cv(hs2), co(cv(hs0), c5, cv(hs1))))), c3, wa(wa(wcel(c0, ccring), wceq(cfv(cidl, c0), cpr(csn(c2), c3))), wcel(cv(hs1), cdif(c3, csn(c2)))))

  adantlr(wcel(c0, crngo), wceq(cfv(cidl, c0), cpr(csn(c2), c3)), wcel(cv(hs1), cdif(c3, csn(c2))), wn(wceq(co(c0, cigen, csn(cv(hs1))), csn(c2))))
  sylan2b(wcel(c0, crngo), wcel(cv(hs1), cdif(c3, csn(c2))), wn(wceq(co(c0, cigen, csn(cv(hs1))), csn(c2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs1), c3), wn(wcel(cv(hs1), csn(c2)))))
  eldif(cv(hs1), c3, csn(c2))

blocks.name: isfldidl2
blocks.content: Determine if a ring is a field based on its ideals. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 6-Jan-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm isfldidl2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cfld), w3a(wcel(c0, ccring), wne(c1, csn(c2)), wceq(cfv(cidl, c0), cpr(csn(c2), c1))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c1st, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(c2nd, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, crn(c3))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cgi, c3))
} = {
  bitri(wcel(c0, cfld), w3a(wcel(c0, ccring), wne(c1, csn(c2)), wceq(cfv(cidl, c0), cpr(csn(c2), c1))), w3a(wcel(c0, ccring), wne(cfv(cgi, c4), c2), wceq(cfv(cidl, c0), cpr(csn(c2), c1))))
  isfldidl(c0, cfv(cgi, c4), c2, c1, c3, c4)
  3bitr4i(w3a(wcel(c0, ccring), wne(cfv(cgi, c4), c2), wceq(cfv(cidl, c0), cpr(csn(c2), c1))), w3a(wcel(c0, ccring), wne(c1, csn(c2)), wceq(cfv(cidl, c0), cpr(csn(c2), c1))), wa(wcel(c0, ccring), wa(wne(cfv(cgi, c4), c2), wceq(cfv(cidl, c0), cpr(csn(c2), c1)))), wa(wcel(c0, ccring), wa(wne(c1, csn(c2)), wceq(cfv(cidl, c0), cpr(csn(c2), c1)))))
  pm5.32i(wcel(c0, ccring), wa(wne(cfv(cgi, c4), c2), wceq(cfv(cidl, c0), cpr(csn(c2), c1))), wa(wne(c1, csn(c2)), wceq(cfv(cidl, c0), cpr(csn(c2), c1))))
  anbi1d(wcel(c0, ccring), wne(cfv(cgi, c4), c2), wceq(cfv(cidl, c0), cpr(csn(c2), c1)), wne(c1, csn(c2)))
  necon3bid(cfv(cgi, c4), c2, c1, csn(c2), wcel(c0, ccring))
  syl(wcel(c0, ccring), wb(wceq(cfv(cgi, c4), c2), wceq(c1, csn(c2))), wcel(c0, crngo))
  crngorngo(c0)
  syl5bb(wcel(c0, crngo), wceq(cfv(cgi, c4), c2), wceq(c1, csn(c2)), wceq(c2, cfv(cgi, c4)))
  eqcom(cfv(cgi, c4), c2)

  3anass(wcel(c0, ccring), wne(c1, csn(c2)), wceq(cfv(cidl, c0), cpr(csn(c2), c1)))
}

thm isfldidl2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ Fld ↔(c0 ∈ CRingOps ∧ c1 ≠ { c2 } ∧(Idl ` c0)= { { c2 }, c1 }))
  ⊣ c3 =(1st ` c0)
  ⊣ c4 =(2nd ` c0)
  ⊣ c1 = ran(c3)
  ⊣ c2 =(GId ` c3)
} = {
  bitri(c0 ∈ Fld, (c0 ∈ CRingOps ∧ c1 ≠ { c2 } ∧(Idl ` c0)= { { c2 }, c1 }), (c0 ∈ CRingOps ∧(GId ` c4)≠ c2 ∧(Idl ` c0)= { { c2 }, c1 }))
  isfldidl(c0, (GId ` c4), c2, c1, c3, c4)
  3bitr4i((c0 ∈ CRingOps ∧(GId ` c4)≠ c2 ∧(Idl ` c0)= { { c2 }, c1 }), (c0 ∈ CRingOps ∧ c1 ≠ { c2 } ∧(Idl ` c0)= { { c2 }, c1 }), (c0 ∈ CRingOps ∧((GId ` c4)≠ c2 ∧(Idl ` c0)= { { c2 }, c1 })), (c0 ∈ CRingOps ∧(c1 ≠ { c2 } ∧(Idl ` c0)= { { c2 }, c1 })))
  pm5.32i(c0 ∈ CRingOps, ((GId ` c4)≠ c2 ∧(Idl ` c0)= { { c2 }, c1 }), (c1 ≠ { c2 } ∧(Idl ` c0)= { { c2 }, c1 }))
  anbi1d(c0 ∈ CRingOps, (GId ` c4)≠ c2, (Idl ` c0)= { { c2 }, c1 }, c1 ≠ { c2 })
  necon3bid((GId ` c4), c2, c1, { c2 }, c0 ∈ CRingOps)
  syl(c0 ∈ CRingOps, ((GId ` c4)= c2 ↔ c1 = { c2 }), c0 ∈ RingOps)
  crngorngo(c0)
  syl5bb(c0 ∈ RingOps, (GId ` c4)= c2, c1 = { c2 }, c2 =(GId ` c4))
  eqcom((GId ` c4), c2)
  0rngo(c0, c2, (GId ` c4), c1, c3, c4)
  eqid((GId ` c4))
  3anass(c0 ∈ CRingOps, (GId ` c4)≠ c2, (Idl ` c0)= { { c2 }, c1 })
  3anass(c0 ∈ CRingOps, c1 ≠ { c2 }, (Idl ` c0)= { { c2 }, c1 })

blocks.name: ispridlc
blocks.content: The predicate "is a prime ideal". Alternate definition for commutative rings. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 19-Jun-2010.)
blocks.origin:
thm ispridlc(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, ccring), wb(wcel(c1, cfv(cpridl, c0)), w3a(wcel(c1, cfv(cidl, c0)), wne(c1, c2), wral(s0, c2, wral(s1, c2, wi(wcel(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), c1), wo(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1))))))))

thm ispridlc(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ CRingOps →(c1 ∈(PrIdl ` c0)↔(c1 ∈(Idl ` c0)∧ c1 ≠ c2 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c2, ∀(s1 ∈ c2,((s0[c3]s1)∈ c1 →(s0 ∈ c1 ∨ s1 ∈ c1)))))))
  ⊣ c4 =(1st ` c0)
  ⊣ c3 =(2nd ` c0)
  ⊣ c2 = ran(c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
} = {
  impbid(c0 ∈ CRingOps, c1 ∈(PrIdl ` c0), (c1 ∈(Idl ` c0)∧ c1 ≠ c2 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c2, ∀(s1 ∈ c2,((s0[c3]s1)∈ c1 →(s0 ∈ c1 ∨ s1 ∈ c1))))))
  sylbid(c0 ∈ CRingOps, c1 ∈(PrIdl ` c0), (c1 ∈(Idl ` c0)∧ c1 ≠ c2 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c2, ∀(s1 ∈ c2,((s0[c3]s1)∈ c1 →(s0 ∈ c1 ∨ s1 ∈ c1))))), (c1 ∈(Idl ` c0)∧ c1 ≠ c2 ∧ ∀(hs3 ∈(Idl ` c0), ∀(hs2 ∈(Idl ` c0),(∀(hs0 ∈ hs3, ∀(hs1 ∈ hs2,(hs0[c3]hs1)∈ c1))→(hs3 ⊆ c1 ∨ hs2 ⊆ c1))))))
